question: Which among the following is the most important condition to decide for the validity of nomination of a College student, who seeks to be elected to the Municipal Council of his / her City?
option1: He / she obtains permission from the Principal of his College
option2: He / she is a member of a Political Party
option3: His / her name figures in the Voter’s List
option4: He / she submits a declaration owing allegiance of the Constitution of India
answer: His / her name figures in the Voter’s List
explanation: The most important condition to decide for the validity of nomination of a College student, who seeks to be elected to the Municipal Council of his / her City is that the name of the student should figure in Voter list.
